summary: This document is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding a media inquiry from NBC News. The inquiry concerns Jeffrey Epstein's ties to a convicted Ponzi schemer and the schemer's claim to have information about Epstein's financial crimes. The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York declined to comment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the NBC News inquiry regarding his ties to a convicted Ponzi schemer and alleged financial crimes.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested. A press conference was held where an 800 number was given out for information.

keyFacts: NBC News was investigating Jeffrey Epstein's ties to a convicted Ponzi schemer from the 1980s/early 1990s.
The convicted Ponzi schemer claimed to have contacted federal authorities via an 800 number provided at a press conference following Epstein's arrest.
The Ponzi schemer claimed to possess information about Epstein's financial crimes.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York declined to comment on the inquiry.
